name: TicTac - Pro
description:
TicTac - Pro is a simple 2D TicTacToe game.

It is fun as you can play with your friends (not online) or if you are a lonely wolf , you can play vs the computer. The game is at its early stages and many cool updates and LIVE Events are coming.

Features
  • Enjoy playing tic-tac-toe even without an internet connection!
  • Game statistics (victories,defeats,ties) save & load.
  • Your mine gets improved by playing this game more than 30 minutes
  • You play according to your mine and your strategy
  • A skill-based game
Characteristics
  • Free
  • Offline/Online
  • Multiplayer
  • Colorblind friendly
  • Lite (10-25 MB)
  • Great quality
  • Mine-Improvement
  • Strategy skills upgrade
Information

TicTac - Pro is made in Unity with the Personal Edition. It is made by 1 ,young. game developer "Lampros Billis" at the age of 15.

  • Machine: Unity
  • Edition: Personal
  • Status: Released (Still under development)
  • Type: 2D
  • Genre: Strategy/Puzzle
  • Countries available: All
